doc:
George Zucco https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Zucco 0 George Zucco (11 January 1886 – 27 May 1960) was an English character actor who appeared, almost always in supporting roles, in 96 films during a career spanning two decades, from 1931 to 1951. In his horror films, he often played a suave villain or a mad doctor. George_Zucco ( 11_January_1886 – 27_May_1960 ) was an_English_character_actor who appeared , almost_always in supporting roles , in 96_films during a_career spanning two_decades , from 1931 to 1951 . In his_horror_films , he often played a_suave_villain or a_mad_doctor .
